name: py-pydicom

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Pure python package for DICOM medical file reading and writing pydicom
is a pure Python package for working with DICOM files. It lets you read,
modify and write DICOM data in an easy "pythonic" way.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-datalad-neuroimaging
dependent_to.description: DataLad extension package for neuro/medical imaging

dependent_to.name: gatetools
dependent_to.description: Python tools for GATE, see https://github.com/OpenGATE/Gate

dependent_to.name: py-pathml
dependent_to.description: An open-source toolkit for computational pathology and machine learning.

dependent_to.name: py-bidskit
dependent_to.description: Tools for DICOM to BIDS conversion.

dependent_to.name: py-bidscoin
dependent_to.description:
Converts and organises raw MRI data-sets according to the Brain Imaging
Data Structure (BIDS).
